评论详情: Super cute design but definitely has a thin material but with the cheaper price it is pretty good purchase
Pants are comfy, but far darker than in the photo. From a distance, they just look black.

We ordered these for my daughter, and the wrong pattern came. She gave them a try though, and after wearing them for about 15 minutes, they started to tear in many different places along the seams. The fabric isn't a patch pattern; it's actual patches of fabric sewed together, very shodily. They aren't made well at all. So disappointing!
